MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY20 postcode area of Machynlleth, affecting properties in Blaeneinion and surrounding areas. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of repairs required and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:50am on 15th March 2021.
